name: Product Designer Growth Blueprint
description: This Notion planner is an actionable guide designed to help you level up in your product design career. It's an actionable tool that makes professional development feel fun and manageable. It's easy to use in any career context and can be modified to suit your needs. It includes: An annual career check-in activity Documentation on the 9 foundational career competencies that underpin all product design job levels Clear expectations and actionable reflection questions across job levels from junior
features: An annual career check-in activity; Documentation on the 9 foundational career competencies that underpin all product design job levels; Clear expectations and actionable reflection questions across job levels from junior designer to principal designer.; A quarterly planning activity to help you focus your efforts on the areas you need to improve based on your reflections
